long_description: The waterproof Camaro Stormtec Dry Suit is a barrier to cold, energy-sapping water and offers very comfortable 4-way stretch that won't impede your motions when paddling or surfing. 100% watertight and breathable. Camaro Stormtec Dry Suit features an integrated neoprene inner vest that enhances warmth and freedom of movement. DryStretch terry liner on interior of suit is soft against skin. Legs are made of 4mm neoprene for excellent warmth. Latex arm and collar cuffs; horizontal rear dry zipper. Closeout.
short_description: The waterproof Camaro Stormtec Dry Suit is a barrier to cold, energy-sapping water and offers very comfortable 4-way stretch that won't impede your motions when paddling or surfing.
